strong.span: Yearbooks are still on sale! Online orders can be sent through Jostens.com! Price reduced back to $50!

span.style: font-weight: bold; font-variant-ligatures: normal; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: normal; text-align: center; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: Verdana; color: rgb(79, 97, 40);
font-size: 14px; font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(28, 30, 33);

span.span: “Harding was my home for four years, and when I reflect on my high school years, my memories are filled with laughs, fun, and late-night studying. Having said that, no high school in the nation can compare to what Harding offers. Harding creates a culture of learning where the students are driven to succeed. For example, I remember grouping together with friends to create Free Response Question essay outlines at coffee shops. My friends and I would debate for hours whether so

span.style: display: inline; font-size: 14px; font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(28, 30, 33);

span.span: mething could be used as a concrete detail to include in our essays. It was in moments like these that I truly see how much Harding had affected us. As a result of this instilled culture, I thrived in college while my friends who were new to balancing studying, friends, free time, etc. were struggling. Attending Harding continues being one of the best decisions I have made in my life.”
